monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Greatly levitates the player - Allows the player to swim - Unaffected by water streams or tar
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Acid Tempest
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Ancient Nurture
skills.description: Aura: Healing and shielding skills (active and passive) of Ancients in your party are increased by 15%. They start combat with Age.

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Barricade
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 4% chance to apply Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Boiling Tide
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Desire
skills.description: Unique Aura: Apply Shield to the party when an enemy receives Burn (Debuff) damage equal to 4% of each Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Weakness
skills.description: Debuff effects increased by 50%

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Fire Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Force of Nature
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (750 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hot to the Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Burn on the attacker.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Lifechannel
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Reckless Mending
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Armor Break or Chill, it regains 3% of Max Health and Max Mana.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Regeneration Shield
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also shields the Monster by 7.5% of its Max Health at the start of turn.

skills.name: Remunerate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 60% chance to gain Regeneration (Buff).

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Scald
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water) every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Scald Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (water) every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Scald Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water) every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Scald Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water) every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Scald Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (water) every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Shared Regeneration
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Regeneration (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Regeneration.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Soul Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Spark Shower
skills.description: 6 x 20% (120%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 30% (180%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 45% (315%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Tenacious Barrier
skills.description: Unique Aura: Barrier also grants a 10% chance to resist the application of Debuffs and harmful Stacks.

skills.name: Trickster Buffing
skills.description: For every buff applied there is a 15% chance to apply Chill, Shock or Burn to a random enemy.

skills.name: Wildfire
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Burn on an enemy, 40% chance to spread it to another enemy.

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
